reviews.review: Some one hack but this game also good
fun game to play with friends :D

This is a great game now that it is free it is a real grab.

You are probably going to want to spend the 15 dollars on prime matchmaking because it will put you with player that are for the most part not cheating. 

The Cheater Problem 

Csgo does have a cheater problem with prime and a high trust factor it becomes less of a issue it can be annoying and frustrating but the fun times outweighs the annoying parts about it. I would also highly recommend queuing with a friend it makes the game 100 times more enjoyable. 

Toxicity 

Csgo has a toxic people in it for sure but there is always a mute button and if you can't handle being called a f*ggot for one out of three games then your probably to young to play this game and you should stay away from it.
